snippet: Jaromir Jagr is still surpassing some of the sport’s icons in goals and points totals, but the Devils have floundered for much of the season, and as the trade deadline looms, his future is uncertain.
abstract: New Jersey Devils right wing Jaromir Jagr is oldest active player in NHL, and though his career statistics are impressive, team may well decide to trade him this season.
lead_paragraph: Jaromir Jagr is still surpassing some of the sport’s icons in goals and points totals, but the Devils have floundered for much of the season, and as the trade deadline looms, his future is uncertain.

headline.seo: Jaromir Jagr Experiencing Adversity With Devils
headline.main: A History of Success, but an Uncertain Future
headline.print_headline: A History of Success, but an Uncertain Future
